00053 BOOL ProximityEventDetector::OnInitDialog () {

00056         m_maturePath = 15;
00057         m_timeDelta = 30;

00060         return TRUE; 
00061 }

00074 GroupingEventDetector::GroupingEventDetector(CString name, int idd) {
00075         this->name = name; IDD = idd;
00076         m_dwellWeight = 0.3;             
00077         m_alignmentWeight = 0.1;         
00078         m_cohesionWeight = 0.6;
00079         m_maxGroupDiameter = 200;
00080         m_fitnessThreshold = 0.8;
00081         m_everyNframe = 30;
00082         m_actT1 = 0.1;
00083         m_actT2 = 0.2;
00084 }
00085 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 void GroupingEventDetector::DoDataExchange (CDataExchange* pDX) {
00087         CTabPageSSL::DoDataExchange (pDX);
00088         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGDWELLW,m_dwellWeight);
00089         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGALIGNMENTW,m_alignmentWeight);
00090         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGCOHESIONW,m_cohesionWeight);
00091         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGGROUPRADIUS,m_maxGroupDiameter);
00092         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGFITNESSTHRESHOLD,m_fitnessThreshold);
00093         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_GROUPINGEVERYNFRAME, m_everyNframe);
00094         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_everyNframe, 1, 10000);
00095         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ACTT1, m_actT1);
00096         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ACTT2, m_actT2);
00097         
00098         
00099 }

00106 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 double GroupingEventDetector::ComputeDistance(BodyClusterElement* bi, BodyClusterElement* bj) {
00108         double d1 = m_dwellWeight*(abs(bi->dwell - bj->dwell));
00109         double d2 = m_alignmentWeight * d_angle(bi->orientation, bj->orientation)/(2*PI);
00110         double d3 = m_cohesionWeight*d(bi->bot, bj->bot)/(m_maxGroupDiameter);
00111         double dist = d1 + d2 + d3;
00112         return dist;
00113 }
00114 
00115 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 double GroupingEventDetector::ComputeSpread(BodyCluster* bi) {
00117         double dist = 0;
00118         if (bi->sub.GetCount() <= 1)
00119                 return 0;
00120         for (int i=0;i<bi->sub.GetCount();i++)
00121                 dist += ComputeDistance(bi, bi->sub[i]);
00122         return dist/bi->sub.GetCount();
00123 }
00124 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 int FindNeighbors(CNewVisionDoc* doc, BodyCluster* all, SmartPtrArray<BodyClusterElement>& dst, CvMat* D_elements, int n, int N=1) {
00126                 double min_val, max_val;
00127                 CvPoint min_loc, max_loc;
00128                 CvMat* D_cpy = (CvMat*)cvClone(D_elements);
00129                 CvMat col; cvGetCol(D_cpy, &col, n);
00130                 int i;
00131                 for (i=0; i<N; i++) { // find N nearest neighbors
00132                         cvMinMaxLoc(&col, &min_val, &max_val, &min_loc, &max_loc); // find first closest 
00133                         if (min_val == FLT_MAX)
00134                                 break;
00135                         //doc->Message(String::Format("i= {0:d1} x={1:d1} y={2:d1} dst={3:f3}  ", i, all->sub[n]->id, all->sub[min_loc.y]->id, min_val));
00136                         dst.Add(all->sub[min_loc.y]);  
00137                         cvSetReal2D(&col, min_loc.y, 0, FLT_MAX);
00138                 }
00139                 cvReleaseMat(&D_cpy);
00140                 return i;
00141 }
00142 double isolation, compactness;
00143 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 double GroupingEventDetector::ComputeGroupClusteringValidity(CNewVisionDoc* doc, CArray<BodyCluster*>& cl, BodyCluster* all, CvMat* D_elements) {
00145         double all_spread = ComputeSpread(all);
00146 
00147         // ==== Validity index = isolation index + compactness index
00148         
00149         // Isolation - how isolated the clusters are
00150         isolation = 0;
00151         const int N=2;
00152 
00153         if (all->sub.GetCount() == 1)
00154                 isolation = 1;
00155 
00156         double norm_i = 0;
00157         
00158         for (int i=0;i<all->sub.GetCount();i++) { // for each node
00159                 SmartPtrArray<BodyClusterElement> nearest;
00160                 int n_found = FindNeighbors(doc, all, nearest, D_elements, i, N);
00161                 int cl_found = -1;
00162                 // get cluster id for target body
00163                 for (int i_cl=0;i_cl<cl.GetCount();i_cl++)
00164                         if (cl[i_cl]->In(all->sub[i]->id)) {
00165                                 cl_found = i_cl;
00166                                 break;
00167                         }
00168                 
00169                 // compare to cluster ids of nearest bodies
00170                 int n_matches = 0;
00171                 for (int i_near=0;i_near<n_found;i_near++) {
00172                         int cl_same = 0;                                
00173                         for (int i_cl=0;i_cl<cl.GetCount();i_cl++)
00174                                 if (cl[i_cl]->In(nearest[i_near]->id)) {
00175                                         if (cl[cl_found]->id == cl[i_cl]->id)
00176                                                 n_matches++;
00177                                 }
00178                 }
00179                 isolation += 1.0*n_matches/n_found;
00180         }
00181         isolation /= all->sub.GetCount();
00182 
00183         // Compactness - how compact the clusters are ( 1 - mean(Diameter_cluster)/Diameter_all )
00184         compactness = 0;
00185         double norm_c = 0;
00186         for (int i=0;i<cl.GetCount();i++)
00187                 if (cl[i]->sub.GetCount()) {
00188                         compactness += ComputeSpread(cl[i]);
00189                         norm_c ++; 
00190                 }
00191         
00192         compactness = 1 - compactness /(norm_c * all_spread);
00193         //doc->Message(String::Format("i={0:f3} c={1:f3} v={2:f3}  ", isolation, compactness, isolation+compactness));
00194         double wCompactness = 5;
00195         return isolation+wCompactness*compactness;
00196 }
00197 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 int GroupingEventDetector::DetectEvents(int nFrame, CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00199         /*
00200         The fitness of body Bi in group Gj can be determined as 
00201         f(Bi, Gj) = W_dwell      * f_dwell +
00202                                 W_alignment  * f_alignment  +
00203                                 W_cohesion   * f_cohesion
00204                                   
00205         Where f_* are functions that compute (  Co-dwelling: dwell near the same or nearby fixture as swarm-mates
00206                                                                                         Alignment: align towards the average heading of the local swarm-mates
00207                                                                                         Cohesion: position itself close to the average position of local swarm-mates )
00208         and W_* are respective weights
00209 
00210         f_dwell(Bi, Gj)     = || Bi_dwell_fixture_xy && mean(Gj_dwell_fixture_xy) ||
00211         f_alignment(Bi, Gj) = (Bi_velocity, mean(Gj_velocity))
00212         f_cohesion(Bi, Gj)  = 1 / || Bi_xy, mean(Gj_xy) ||
00213         */
00214 
00215         if (nFrame % m_everyNframe)
00216                 return -1;
00217 
00218         // --------- At each frame perfom a mapping of Bi (bodies) to Gi (groups)------------
00219 
00220         // (1.0) Prepare a set of N singleton clusters and NxN distance matrix 
00221         int N = doc->bodymodel.body.GetCount();
00222         if (N < 2)
00223                 return 0;
00224 
00225         CvMat* D = cvCreateMat(N, N, CV_64FC1); // lower-left diagonal matrix
00226         cvSet(D, cvScalar(FLT_MAX));
00227         SmartPtrArray<BodyCluster> cl;
00228         SmartPtrArray<BodyCluster> cl_copy;
00229         POSITION pos = doc->bodymodel.body.GetStartPosition();
00230         int i=0;
00231         BodyCluster all;        
00232         while (pos) {
00233                 int id1; Body *b;
00234                 doc->bodymodel.body.GetNextAssoc(pos, id1, b);
00235                 BodyClusterElement *bce = new BodyClusterElement(b);
00236                 cl.Add(new BodyCluster(bce));
00237                 all.Add(bce);
00238                 for (int j=0;j<i;j++) {
00239                         double d = ComputeDistance(cl[i], cl[j]);
00240                         cvSetReal2D(D, i, j, d);
00241                         cvSetReal2D(D, j, i, d);
00242                 }
00243                 i++;
00244         }
00245         CvMat* D_elements = (CvMat*)cvClone(D);
00246 
00247         // (2.0) Perform agglomerative clustering 
00248         double kValidityNow = ComputeGroupClusteringValidity(doc, cl, &all, D_elements); // to determine the optimal number of clusters compute clustering validity index
00249         double kValidityBefore = 0; 
00250         int step=0;
00251         String ^msg = gcnew String("");
00252         do {
00253                         double min_val, max_val;
00254                         CvPoint min_loc, max_loc;
00255                         cl_copy.Copy(cl);
00256                         cvMinMaxLoc(D, &min_val, &max_val, &min_loc, &max_loc);
00257                         if (min_val == FLT_MAX)
00258                                 break;
00259                         BodyCluster *b1 = cl[min_loc.x], *b2= cl[min_loc.y];
00260                         // break if no more close bodies
00261                         if (d(b1->bot, b2->bot) > m_maxGroupDiameter )
00262                                 break;
00263                         
00264                         // merge
00265                         //doc->Message(String::Concat("Add ", b2->id, " at [", b2->bot.x, ", ", b2->bot.y, "] to ", b1->id, " at [", b1->bot.x, ", ", b1->bot.y, "]"));
00266                         b1->Add(b2);
00267                         //doc->Message(String::Concat("Result at [", b1->bot.x, ", ", b1->bot.y, "] "));
00268                         b2->sub.RemoveAllPointers();
00269 
00270                         // change row and col 'min_loc.x'
00271                         for (int i=0;i<N;i++) {
00272                                 if (i == min_loc.x)
00273                                         continue;
00274                                 double dist = ComputeDistance(cl[i], b1);
00275                                 cvSetReal2D(D, i, min_loc.x, dist);
00276                                 cvSetReal2D(D, min_loc.x, i, dist);
00277                         }
00278 
00279                         // erase row and col 'min_loc.y'
00280                         for (int i=0;i<N;i++) {
00281                                 cvSetReal2D(D, i, min_loc.y, FLT_MAX);
00282                                 cvSetReal2D(D, min_loc.y, i, FLT_MAX);
00283                         }
00284                         msg += String::Format("{0:f2}:{1:f2}  ", isolation, compactness);
00285 
00286                         kValidityBefore = kValidityNow;
00287                         kValidityNow = ComputeGroupClusteringValidity(doc, cl, &all, D_elements);
00288                         
00289                         step++;
00290                 } while (kValidityNow > kValidityBefore);
00291                 msg += String::Format("{0:f2}:{1:f2}  ", isolation, compactness);
00292                 //doc->Message(msg);
00293                 
00294                 //doc->Message(String::Format("step={3:d1} {0:f2}+{1:f2}={2:f2}  ", isolation, compactness, kValidityNow, step));
00295 
00296 
00297         // (3.0) populate group events array
00298         int EVENT_FRAME_CONFIDENCE = 100;
00299         int count = cl_copy.GetCount();
00300         for (int i=0;i<count;i++) {
00301                 if (cl_copy[i]->sub.GetCount() < 2)
00302                         continue;
00303                 SwarmEvent* ev1 = new SwarmEvent(nFrame, name);
00304                 for (int k=0;k<cl_copy[i]->sub.GetCount();k++)
00305                         ev1->AddActor(cl_copy[i]->sub[k]->id, kValidityNow);
00306                 
00307                 // find the closest existing event with all actors matching, then merge
00308                 double maxDistance = FLT_MAX; int eid = -1;
00309                 POSITION posE = doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetStartPosition();
00310                 int id2; SwarmEvent *ev2;
00311                 while (posE) {
00312                         doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE, id2, ev2);
00313                         echo(String::Format("dist {0}",ev1->GetAverageFrameDistance(ev2)));
00314                         if ( ev1->GetAverageFrameDistance(ev2) <= EVENT_FRAME_CONFIDENCE // ev1 and ev2 are consequent, given the sampling rate 
00315                                         && ev1->actors.GetCount() == ev2->actors.GetCount()   // ev1 and ev2 have identical set of actors
00316                                         && ev1->Distance(ev2) < maxDistance ) {               // ev2 is the closest to ev1 
00317                                 maxDistance = ev1->Distance(ev2);
00318                                 eid = id2;
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 // if found an amlost identical event match - merge
00323                 if (eid != -1) {
00324                         doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.Lookup(eid, ev2);
00325                         ev2->Add(ev1);
00326                         SwarmEvent::last_id--;
00327                 }
00328                 // otherwise, create a new event map entry
00329                 else
00330                         doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.SetAt(ev1->id, ev1);
00331         }
00332 
00333         // (4.0) Cleanup
00334         cvReleaseMat(&D);
00335         cvReleaseMat(&D_elements);
00336         cl.RemoveAll();
00337         cl_copy.RemoveAll();
00338         return count;
00339 }
00340 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00341 // Detects activities in on step after all events are collected 
00342 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00343 int GroupingEventDetector::PostProcessActivities(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00344         CArray<INode*> node;
00345         CArray<ICluster*> cluster;
00347 //      System::IO::StreamWriter^ log = File::CreateText("F:\\My Documents\\My Research\\Results\\Data\\Activity Data\\chuka.csv");
00348 //      for (POSITION posE = doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetStartPosition(); posE != NULL;) {
00349 //              int id; SwarmEvent *ev;
00350 //              doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE, id, ev);
00351 //              for (POSITION posE2 = doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetStartPosition(); posE2 != NULL;) {
00352 //                      int id2; SwarmEvent *ev2;
00353 //                      doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE2, id2, ev2);
00354 //                      log->WriteLine(String::Format("{0}", ev->Distance(ev2)));
00355 //              }
00356 //      }
00357 //      log->Close();
00358 //      return 0;
00359 
00360         for (POSITION posE = doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetStartPosition(); posE != NULL;) {
00361                 int id; SwarmEvent *ev;
00362                 doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE, id, ev);
00363                 node.Add(ev);
00364         }
00365 
00366         ClusteringParams param;
00367         param.maxIterations             = 20;   // maximum number of iterations
00368         param.maxClusters               = 20;   // initial number of clusters
00369         param.minNodeDistance   = 0.1;  // a threshold to group SwarmEvents to form initial clusters
00370         param.maxNodeDistance   = 0.7;  // a threshold to remove SwarmEvents that are too far away from any other events (i.e outliers)
00371         param.minCardinality    = 0.4;  // minimum cardinality to keep cluster alive
00372         param.eta0                              = 1;    // multiplier: controls the speed of clustering
00373         param.tau                               = 10;   // exponent: controls the speed of clustering
00374         param.nIteration0               = 10;   // after this iteration clustering will slow down
00375         param.cTuningMin                = 4;    // a tuning constant
00376         param.cTuning0                  = 12;   // a tuning constant
00377         param.cTuningDelta              = 1;    // a tuning constant
00378 
00379         ClusteringMachine cm(param);
00380         cm.RunFuzzy(node, cluster);
00381 
00382         // export to activity map
00383         double EPSILON = 0.3;
00384         for (int i=0;i<cluster.GetCount();i++) {
00385                 ((SwarmActivity*)(cluster[i]))->actors.RemoveAll();
00386                 // for each event
00387                 for (POSITION pos = cluster[i]->rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00388                         int nid; Record* r;
00389                         cluster[i]->rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00390                         if (r->u > EPSILON) {
00391                                 // copy all significant actors
00392                                 for (POSITION posA = ((SwarmEvent*)r->node)->actors.GetStartPosition(); posA != NULL;) {
00393                                         int aid; double p;
00394                                         ((SwarmEvent*)r->node)->actors.GetNextAssoc(posA, aid, p);
00395                                         p = 0;
00396                                         ((SwarmActivity*)(cluster[i]))->actors.Lookup(aid, p);
00397                                         // accumulate weight from all events
00398                                         ((SwarmActivity*)(cluster[i]))->actors.SetAt(aid, p+r->u);
00399                                 }
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 if (((SwarmActivity*)(cluster[i]))->actors.GetCount())
00403                         doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.SetAt(cluster[i]->id, (SwarmActivity*)cluster[i]);
00404         }
00405         return 0;
00406 }

00475 void GroupingEventDetector::Serialize( CArchive& ar ) {

00477         if( ar.IsStoring())
00478                 ar << m_dwellWeight << m_alignmentWeight << m_cohesionWeight << m_maxGroupDiameter << m_fitnessThreshold << m_actT1 << m_actT2; 
00479         else
00480                 ar >> m_dwellWeight >> m_alignmentWeight >> m_cohesionWeight >> m_maxGroupDiameter >> m_fitnessThreshold >> m_actT1 >> m_actT2; 
00481 }
